summary: A very simple mod that removes the ANNOYING chattering sound that you can hear inside/outside taverns.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Ohraahriohri bla bla bla bla... Ohraahriohri bla bla bla....Â Ohraahriohri bla bla bla bla

Seriously, WTF is that!? It's one of the most disappointing and unimmersive things you can find across ALL Skyrim world. Even with a lot of npcs mod, your taverns will not EVER seems so crowded. And also, why they always repeat the same senseless words???

The porpouse of this mod is to REMOVE TOTALLY this abomination.

If you haven't any idea of what i'm talking about, you're simply deaf. Aside from jokes, if you're so inattentive try to enter in a tavern (i suggest the Winking Skeever or Bannered Mare) around 10 PM o'cloack. Put to 0 the music volume and to 100 the effects one. And finally you will understand what i'm blabbering about. It can be called the "crawded mess" or whatever we can call it. And if EVEN NOW you still don't understand what i mean, you can watch this video:

[youtube]ValCDBiYAt4[/youtube]

If you don't need to do all this mess and already know what i'm talking about... well seriously, YOU ARE STILL HERE? Hurry and download the mod!!!!!

The archive contains 4 audio files that replace the vannila's ones. They are silent and empty like the head of the idiot that suggested to put this sound inside/outside a desolate place. You can install the mod simply putting it in the data folder or (HIGLY RECCOMENDED) using a mod manager for easily install/uninstall. The mod don't contains esps, bsas and ABOVE ALL SCRIIIIIPTS. This is the reason why its version is FINAL.

If you want to update/share this s**t, feel free to do. I write this because... well i don't know even why. I can't imagine the porpouse of doing it... outside a sudden madness.[/size]
author: FEDERICOOO
